item.title: To whom it concerns my neighbor at 21 Corsley Way, London E9 5PD keeps playing loud music on 25/07/25 at 23:15pm he has a professional music deck in his living room. Constantly playing music all Hours on and off mixing music tracks as that is his professional hobby. If someone could please address this issue causing me so much stress and restless nights antisocial behaviour.., 25th July

item.title: Street Lamp Issue - Light Directed into Garden, 25th July
item.description:
I’m writing to report an issue with the street lamp directly infront of my property, 109 Kingswood Road, BR2 0NG. It appears that the angle or direction of the light has shifted, and it is now shining directly into my garden. In the evenings, the glare is so intense that it’s like looking into the sun, and I’m unable to comfortably use part of my garden because of how blinding it is. I believe the lamp may need to be repositioned or adjusted. I’d really appreciate it if someone could come to inspect and resolve the issue. Thank you in advance for your help. Kind regards, Lisa

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive fly tipping next to the house, 25th July
item.description:
There is a small gap next to the house where bins general and recycle are kept for house 118A and B Crescent Road, SE18 7AQ. But people are leaving the excessive waste in the gap like a dumping site causing hazard for the people living nearby aswell as for people walking and most of the time the waste exceed to the street. The situation has been going for more than 6 months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121, Crescent Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
